import React from 'react' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/client' import { ALL_AUTHORS } from '../query' const Authors = (props) => { const authors = useQuery(ALL_AUTHORS) console.log('Authors?', authors) if (!props.show) { return null } return (

authors

{authors.data.map(a => )}
born books
{a.name} {a.born} {a.bookCount}
) } export default Authors
